entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Fog patches. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 4 May 2023
